quote: AI can give you information about the other person, helping you establish rapport and find common ground.
why_clipworthy: This highlights a specific, actionable use of AI in negotiations.
suggested_hook: Want to close more deals? Here's how AI can help you build rapport with clients.

quote: One of the simplest ways to get the conflict to be over is to apologize. It shows strength, not weakness.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the common perception of apologies as a weakness in negotiations.
suggested_hook: Think apologies are a sign of weakness in negotiations? Think again.
